It is more convenient to carry than 15.6 inch, whether outdoors or at home, providing you with more Smooth and convenient office/game experience, fast response, no flicker, low blue light eye protection,

「Portable Monitor on the go」WIDE COMPATIBILITY - NIUTO Portable Laptop Monitor is equipped with 2 USB Type-C ports and Mini-HDMI port, easy access to your favorite devices with 1 cable solution, compatible with most laptops 💻, smartphones 📱, PC, PS5*PS4, XBOX series, or Nintendo Switch🎮, also equipped with 3.5mm headphone jack and excellent dual speakers, complete game/audio experience

「Portable Monitor Plug and Play」The monitor is 0.3-inch ultra-thin, 1.3LB, dual USB-C full-function interface and mini HDMI interface, equipped with HDMI to mini HDMI cable and two USB-C data cables, supports full-function USB-C/HDMI computer split screen Use, support full-featured USB-C mobile phone screen projection, equipped with HDMI to mini HDMI cable, convenient and fast,

Comes with a sticky pouch. Strong protection when going out, it also has a small pocket, which can be put into chargers, data cables and other items, easy to carry, strong assistant for outdoor and home or office, convenient and fast to watch movies/games when going out, enjoy your life

Package Contents & Warranty」NIUTO Portable Monitor’s Package includes 5 kinds of adapter cables, a 18W adapter. NOUTO provides a 100% money back guarantee for any issue within 30 days and a quick responding tech support online.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1080P FHD resolution + eye protection IPS panel Niuto portable monitors were born to create gorgeous visual enjoyment and redefine the way people work and play. 13.3 1080 full HD screen, vivid picture, ultra-clear video playback, meet expectations. The IPS panel enables the display to have wide viewing angles, short response times and smooth motion trajectories, creating an excellent experience for both viewers and gamers. The full color gamut screen ensures that the monitor can fully enjoy zero distortion and clear images, allowing you to enjoy excellent video transmission in games and other entertainment. The built-in eye protection blue light filter minimizes blue light and effectively reduces eye fatigue. The HD protective film on the screen surface not only double protects your eyes from fatigue, but also provides excellent image performance. Embrace this advanced monitor from NIUTO to expand your horizons and increase your convenience!

This 13.3'' monitor is incredibly simple to use thanks to its USB-C connection, which uses a single cable to transmit video, sound and power. Simply connect your desktop or laptop to the monitor with USB C/HDMI for dual display or extending. It is ideal for sharing idears or fun on the go. Easily slip it into a backpack and carry it around The expansive viewing angles provided by IPS monitors help to deliver outstanding color when being viewed from different angles and color accuracy and screen consistency

· Best for traveling.It comes with great features.Increases your productivity.It occupies less space.User-friendly interface.Provides multitasking facility.Serves as a backup when the main television is out of order .It provides immense pleasure and fun to viewers . With a portable monitor that you can easily bring anywhere, you will be able to present your ideas to your clients clearly, or conquer the latest video game effectively, even when you travel. provides a felt bag that can hold the monitor and its accessories, protects the data cable charger and portable monitor, easy to travel, enjoy life anytime, anywhere

What's in the box 1 x 13.3inch Portable Monitor 2x USB-C to USB-C Cable (Full-functioned) 1 x Mini HDMI to HDMI Cable (For data transmission only) 1xFelt bag storage bag 1xPortable Stand 1 x Wall Charger 1 x User Manual

Definition of New Life Styles NOTE: Please check if the USB Type-C port of your laptop or cell phone is a full-featured Type-C port. If is a Type-C port for charging, it will not be available.You will need to connect your laptop to the monitor via the HDMI port and meantime power supply for monitor. NIUTO Monitor need above 5V/2A stable power to keep display with more brightness, so highly recommend connect to external power supply with our power adapter for the best visual experience, otherwise it maybe enter energy conservation mode(Flicker/30% brightness) or even standby mode(NO Signal) automatically. Please check if your laptop has a USB 3.0 or a USB Type C port. If not you will need to connect your laptop to the monitor via the HDMI port. Some laptop have low power USB c ports, it will can't transfer the data and power at the same time,so you should need an external power to power the monitor. This USB C portable monitor does not contain any battery. If the monitor appears to flicker or restart when adjusting the brightness or others, please check whether the power supply is sufficient for the monitor. It is recommended to use the power adapter that supports 5V2.4A or above for power supply. You can press Roll Key to enter the OSD menu to adjust the brightness, volume and more settings. 3. System Requirement: Devices with HDMI output interface, Computers or mobile phones with Type-C Fully Functional port

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Performs exactly as hoped
reviews.reviewText: Not really much to say, the display is great. The only improvement would be to include 90' and 180' adapters which would result in a cleaner setup in most situations, and I would have happily paid more for these to have been included - or even have them available as an accessory pack with a promo-card with the display.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Product that has increased my productivity!
reviews.reviewText: This monitor does everything that they say it does.The image is extremely sharp with multiple adjustments to suit your needs. It is very sleek and well designed with multiple input options and speakers that actually sound good - not tinny.Setup if very easy and simple. I have the monitor connected with a USB-C cable that came with the monitor to my laptop, which is used to power the monitor. It is a great value for the money and rugged enough to withstand a home office environment for a full week at a time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic monitor for my use but USB-C adapter may possibly be an issue.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the monitor for use as an external display with an amateur radio. I have discovered that the USB-C adapter which came with the monitor was generation a large amount of RFI. I don't know if the adapter became defective after some time but I just want buyers to be aware of this possible issue. The monitor itself works wonderfully as the external display.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars NIUTO Portable 13” Monitor - Does the job but THAT GLARE
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- “It just works” for everything I’ve plugged it into- Perfect size for 1080P- very lightweight- just one cable for 90% of my use cases- Built-in speaker- Elegant and soft case- one of the cheapest options for fully portable monitors (that are higher than 720P)- analog headphone jack- decent viewing angles- included all needed cables AND cables were of decent length and quality- If you ignore the glare and low brightness the screen is crisp and clear with no noticeable dead pixels or “bad spots”Cons:- The screen seems to attract more glare and fingerprints than any monitor i’ve had in years- Brightness isn’t high enough to compensate for the heavy-glare- Low brightness in general makes it less usable in sunny/fluorescently lit places- The included stand fell apart after the 3rd use so I have a rubber band keeping it together now (seems to be holding)- speaker volume is VERY low (so I end up using bluetooth or the headphone jack)- the included case is great for protecting the screen itself with cables but the stand causes it to be overly bulky in my bag- included stand seems like an afterthought compared with the rest of my he unit- It is so lightweight it feels like I could easily damage the unitOther observations:For $80 I don’t feel like this was a bad purchase - but just be aware that you will “feel” the cheapness due to the terrible screen glare and very low brightness. If you use it in a dark corner of a coffee shop or somewhere at night while traveling then you won’t have any issues.Tested with a Nintendo Switch, Onn Google TV Streaming Box, Microsoft Surface Laptop 2, and Dell Latitude 5440 and had no issues with any of these devices.The little plastic stand is pretty bad and I will probably need to find another way to prop it up eventually - would have preferred a built in kickstand of some sort.Lastly - This screen would have been so much more usable had they went with a matte display instead of this glossy super-glare screen. The meh brightness wouldn’t be much of an issue either had they went with a matte screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I got this monitor for my brother-in-law. He's been wanting to purchase one since Christmas so I decided to go ahead & order it for him. The package arrived within 3 days and the packaging was great. The monitor was well protected in the original box and Amazon box. This is perfect for watching TV shows, gaming, reading, and traveling. I only wish it came in a bigger size. It is pretty lightweight and easy to set up. If you need a monitor, this will probably do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Couldn't use it.
reviews.reviewText: Beautifully packaged. Nice image quality. Unfortunately I couldn't get it to lo k up to my laptop. Kept getting an "out of range" message and was not able to troubleshoot the problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a 32" main monitor where I do my work. I added this as a second monitor below that to watch videos and have a little more screen space for applications when I need it. It works great and has a more premium feel that I thought it would. Also comes with very nice almost apple-like packaging. Good buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Cat TV
reviews.reviewText: Great TV for my cat shelves so they can watch some cat TV. Wish it came with some brackets to slide it in and out of in the wall, but I was able to 3D print something. It was also nice to have built in speakers and connections that let me only need a Roku to get stuff playing and a strong screen for my cats to paw at and not damage.
